description: Ministry of City Planning & Water Supply - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties of Narankaduwa Watta & Ambalamwatta, Pathahewaheta D/S Division and Asgiriya, Kandy Gangawata Korale D/S Division, Kandy District and Nugemula Kumbura & Goda Idama, Rathtota D/S Division, Matale District
